mapper.select:
SELECT A.AS_PGM_ID ,A.AS_PGM_NM ,A.TO_PGM_ID ,A.TO_PGM_NM ,C.DTLS_TYNM AS AS_PGM_DIS_NM ,A.USE_PGM_TXT ,B.EMPNM AS DVLPE_NM ,D.DTLS_TYNM AS TRN_STT_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.FRCS_STA_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRCS_STA_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(A.FRCS_END_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRCS_END_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(A.STA_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS STA_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DT ,A.RMRK ,A.AS_PGM_DIS_CD ,A.DVLPE_NO ,A.TRN_STT_CD ,A.BKUP_ID ,A.PRJT_ID FROM pms_as_to_map A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.EMPNO = A.DVLPE_NO AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng C ON C.DTLS_TYCD = A.AS_PGM_DIS_CD AND C.GRP_TYCD = '1000000051' AND C.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng D ON D.DTLS_TYCD = A.TRN_STT_CD AND D.GRP_TYCD = '1000000052' AND D.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND D.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
AND A.AS_PGM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{as_pgm_id},'%'))
AND A.TO_PGM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{to_pgm_id},'%'))
AND A.USE_PGM_TXT LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{use_pgm_txt},'%'))
ORDER BY A.AS_PGM_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pms_as_to_map WHERE 1=1 AND BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
